vocabinfos.mediumDef:
(Qal) to love, be attached to, long for
§ (Qal) to love, be attached to, long for
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (Qal) 愛, 牽繫於 = 戀慕
2) (Piel) 用帶子或環裝設
3) (Pual) 用帶子裝設
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) (Qal) 爱, 牵系于 = 恋慕
2) (Piel) 用带子或环装设
3) (Pual) 用带子装设
